Generator_Type__COMMENT: One from the list [Random, Analog, Digital]

Signal_Parameters.Using_Variables__COMMENT: if you use random, you can leave this field empty. If you use another type, list the names of variables separated by comma

Generation_Parameters.Datetime_Intervals__COMMENT: DATETIME FORMAT: '{4 digits}-{2 digits}-{2 digits}T{2 digits}:{2 digits}:{2 digits}'
